tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE course_materials (
  material_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  material_type VARCHAR(50),
  course_id UUID,
  material_name TEXT,
  material_content BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE assignments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    due_date DATE,
    course_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE course_materials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_type TEXT,
    url TEXT,
    upload_date DATE,
    course_id INT
);
